attributes.action: scrap the human rights act and replace it with an act that while preserving peoples rights does not give criminals the same rights as the rest of the population
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent case when two brothers where convicted of murder in Peckham.   The police believed them to be older than they claimed and wanted them to have a dental check to prove this so they could be sentenced as adults but could not force them to have the check as this would have infringed there human rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
